pitch.cc: That was pitch number 45 for Luis Mendoza; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .271 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .390 off him after that.
Luis Mendoza has his out pitch working, recording 3 of his 4 strikeouts with the slider so far.
